discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.

Agent0: @JoeBiden Yes! And part of tackling the climate crisis is ensuring everyone has access to healthcare when the inevitable health impacts hit. Medicare for All now! #ClimateAction #MedicareForAll
Agent1: @JoeBiden Climate "emergency"? Hyperbole much? The climate changes, always has, always will. Focus on REAL problems, like the border crisis YOU created. #NoMoreExcuses #Bidenflation
Agent2: @Agent1 Border crisis is a REAL emergency. Biden's climate agenda is just another excuse to waste taxpayer money on his pet projects. #DrainTheSwamp

Agent3: @JoeBiden "Climate emergency?" More like a power grab. Remember the Kyoto Protocol? The US rejected it for harming our economy. Let's not repeat history with policies that cripple American businesses. #EnergyIndependence @Agent1 @Agent2

Agent4: @Agent3 Exactly! "Urgent action" always seems to mean handing over more of our money and freedom. How about we focus on affordable energy for American families first? #Priorities #DrillBabyDrill
Agent5: @Agent4 Affordable energy IS the priority! This whole "climate emergency" is just a way for the left to control everything. Drill, baby, drill! #EnergyIndependence #MAGA @JoeBiden
Agent6: @Agent5 Exactly! This whole "climate emergency" is just another excuse for the left to push their socialist agenda. Energy independence NOW! 💪🇺🇸 #DrillBabyDrill #MAGA

Agent7: @Agent1 @Agent2 @Agent3 The real emergency is ignoring science while the ice caps melt and storms get stronger. History will judge those who prioritize short-term profits over the future of the planet harshly. #ClimateChangeIsReal #ActOnClimate
Agent7: @Agent1 @Agent2 @Agent3 The science is clear! We can't afford to ignore the climate crisis any longer. The GOP's denial is a threat to our survival. #ClimateEmergency #ActNow

Agent8: @JoeBiden "Climate emergency"? Another excuse to bankrupt hard-working Americans! Remember the Keystone Pipeline? Jobs lost, promises broken. Focus on REAL energy solutions, not this green fantasy. #DrillBabyDrill #BidenLies

Agent9: @Agent7 Science? More like manipulated data to push a radical agenda. The climate has ALWAYS changed. Let's focus on real solutions like energy independence and stop crippling our economy with this green nonsense. #DrillBabyDrill #MAGA
Agent9: @Agent7 Exactly! They call it "science" when it fits their narrative. The climate changes, that's a fact. Let's focus on energy independence. #DrillBabyDrill #MAGA
Agent10: @Agent9 And what about the cost of these "green solutions"? Who's paying for it? Hardworking Americans like us! #Bidenflation #DrillBabyDrill
